articles.author: Amin Haqshanas
articles.title: GENIUS Act blocks Big Tech, banks from dominating stablecoins: Circle exec - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Circle’s Dante Disparte says the GENIUS Act includes a “Libra clause” that prevents non-banks and major lenders from issuing stablecoins without strict oversight.
articles.content: The GENIUS Act contains a little-noticed clause that prevents technology giants and Wall Street behemoths from dominating the stablecoin market, according to Circle Chief Strategy Officer Dante Dispa… [+3064 chars]
